nodes.label: ProgrammePartner->CompanyUser - Update Record to Pending (Cohort Invite)
Script Task - Add Mentor to Cohort
Script Task - Add Investor to Cohort
Script Task - Add Company User to Cohort
Script Task - Add Company to Cohort
Script Task - Add Mentor to Programme

attachment.script:
const dashRef = admin.database().ref(`dashboards/${data.dashboard}`)
let mentors = (await dashRef.child(`models/programmeData/${context.data.programme}/mentors`).once('value')).val() || ''
if (!mentors.includes(context.data.mentor)) {
  if (mentors) mentors += `,${context.data.mentor}`
  else mentors += context.data.mentor
}

createLog(
  callDash,
  '',
  mentors,
  'programmeData',
  context.data.programme,
  'mentors'
)

nodes.label: Script Task - Add CompanyUser to Programme

attachment.script:
const dashRef = admin.database().ref(`dashboards/${data.dashboard}`)
let companyUsers = (await dashRef.child(`models/programmeData/${context.data.programme}/companyUsers`).once('value')).val() || ''
if (!companyUsers.includes(context.data.companyUser)) {
  if (companyUsers) companyUsers += `,${context.data.companyUser}`
  else companyUsers += context.data.companyUser
}

createLog(
  callDash,
  '',
  companyUsers,
  'programmeData',
  context.data.programme,
  'companyUsers'
)
